__e: I WENT FROM FEELING SHAME AND NOT KNOWING HOW TO COPE TO NOW HAVING STRANGERS COME UP AND TELL ME HOW BRAVE OUR DAUGHTER IS
You are the bravest and strongest person... that I've ever met in my entire life.
And I know... I know it hurts... and it feels like you can't go any further, but this is the time you have to be brave and push through it and have faith.
I think it was very brave of this person to tell us how they're feeling, and I want them to know that they are not alone.
I told her once that I thought she was braver than all of us because she had to live with her fear every day.
I'm not the bravest person on the planet.
I'm not sure I could have been as brave as you've been in this place.
THEY HAD NO CHOICE. OKAY, LET ME GET THIS STRAIGHT.
But what you did, going public, telling the truth about what happened, that might just be the bravest thing I've ever seen.
